verses.verse: And <S%H518>if<s%> his <S%H7133>oblation<s%> be a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offering,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H7126>offer<s%> it <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1241>herd;<s%> <S%H518>whether<s%> it be a <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> <S%H5347>female,<s%> he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H7133>offering,<s%> and <S%H7819>kill<s%> it at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> round <S%H5439>about.<s%>

And he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> of the <S%H4480>sacrifice<s%> <S%H2077><s%> of the peace <S%H8002>offering<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covereth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7130>inwards,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7130>inwards,<s%>

And the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5921>on<s%> them, <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H3689>flanks,<s%> and the <S%H3508>caul<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H3516>liver,<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> it shall he take <S%H5493>away.<s%>

And <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>sacrifice,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6086>wood<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H784>fire:<s%> it is an offering made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> for a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H6629>flock;<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H5347>female,<s%> he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it without <S%H8549>blemish.<s%>
If <S%H518><s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H3775>lamb<s%> <S%H853><s%> for his <S%H7133>offering,<s%> then shall he <S%H7126>offer<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H7133>offering,<s%> and <S%H7819>kill<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> of the <S%H4480>sacrifice<s%> <S%H2077><s%> of the peace <S%H8002>offering<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> thereof, and the <S%H8549>whole<s%> <S%H451>rump,<s%> it shall he take <S%H5493>off<s%> hard <S%H5980>by<s%> the <S%H6096>backbone;<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covereth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7130>inwards,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7130>inwards,<s%>

And the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5921>upon<s%> them, <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H3689>flanks,<s%> and the <S%H3508>caul<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H3516>liver,<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> it shall he take <S%H5493>away.<s%>
And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> it upon the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> it is the <S%H3899>food<s%> of the offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And <S%H518>if<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> be a <S%H5795>goat,<s%> then he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of it, and <S%H7819>kill<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation:<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> round <S%H5439>about.<s%>

And he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H4480>thereof<s%> his <S%H7133>offering,<s%> even an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covereth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7130>inwards,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7130>inwards,<s%>

And the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5921>upon<s%> them, <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H3689>flanks,<s%> and the <S%H3508>caul<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H3516>liver,<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> it shall he take <S%H5493>away.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> them upon the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> it is the <S%H3899>food<s%> of the offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD's.<s%>

It shall be a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%> for your <S%H1755>generations<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4186>dwellings,<s%> that ye <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H2459>fat<s%> nor <S%H1818>blood.<s%>
